## Peyman Eshghi

Peyman Eshghi is a Data Scientist with over 16 years of experience, currently serving as the Technical Lead at Johnson & Johnson in the UK. Specializing in R programming, he leads interactive data visualization projects using R and Shiny and is the appointed product owner of the teal framework at Johnson & Johnson.
